title: Wasted resources
creator_credit: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Katherine Smalley
brief_description: Programs to find employment for the mentally retarded have been producing some encouraging results in Canada. Once dubious employers who participated are finding themselves with reliable help. The film shows people employed in a variety of different jobs, and social workers describe the programs they have developed.
